text: The Cabuyao Mansion (formerly known as Marcos Twin Mansion), is an abandoned mansion owned by the Marcoses family to the late Philippine president, Ferdinand Marcos. ==Location== The golfcourse is situated along the Canlubang Golf & Country Club and Matang Tubig, It was established since 1987 and stretches to the "Imelda Marcos Mansion" in People's Park in the Sky in Tagaytay city, It is also under by the Presidential Commission on Good Government. ==References== Category:Laguna (province)
title: Cabuyao Mansion
